issue.title: Error using playback of cloudsim log

content.raw: The double `//` should be ok. The parser should be able to handle that I believe.  The workaround suggested in issue #209 may also resolve this playback issue. If you’re still getting similar error messages, one thing to check is see if the dae files actually exist in `~/.ignition/fuel/…` cache directory.
content.html: The double // should be ok. The parser should be able to handle that I believe. The workaround suggested in issue #209 may also resolve this playback issue. If you’re still getting similar error messages, one thing to check is see if the dae files actually exist in ~/.ignition/fuel/… cache directory.
